modules.name: godot-tools
build-commands:
scons platform=x11 \
                       CCFLAGS=-I/app/include \
                       prefix=/app \
                       unix_global_settings_path=/app \
                       verbose=yes \
                       -j `nproc` \
                       target=release_debug \
                       use_llvm=yes \
                       builtin_freetype=no \
                       builtin_libmpcdec=yes \
                       builtin_libogg=no \
                       builtin_libpng=no \
                       builtin_libtheora=no \
                       builtin_libvorbis=no \
                       builtin_libwebp=no \
                       builtin_openssl=no \
                       builtin_libvpx=no \
                       builtin_zlib=no \
                       builtin_opus=yes \
                       builtin_speex=yes \
                       builtin_squish=yes \
                       pulseaudio=yes \
                       udev=no \
                       tools=yes

modules.name: godot-release-template
build-commands:
scons platform=x11 \
                       CCFLAGS=-I/app/include \
                       prefix=/app \
                       unix_global_settings_path=/app \
                       verbose=yes \
                       -j `nproc` \
                       target=release \
                       use_llvm=yes \
                       builtin_freetype=no \
                       builtin_libmpcdec=yes \
                       builtin_libogg=no \
                       builtin_libpng=no \
                       builtin_libtheora=no \
                       builtin_libvorbis=no \
